issue.title: Infinite "connection checking" loading

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

Adguard 4.3 Nightly 18

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://modyolo.com and https://apkmody.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter, Fanboy's Social Blocking List

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, Fanboy's Annoyances, Web Annoyances Ultralist, I don't care about cookies

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

### Other

Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, AdGuard Experimental filter

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard Dutch filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Ukrainian filter, ABPindo, ABPVN List, Adblock List for Finland, AdBlockID, Bulgarian list, CJX's Annoyances List, Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters, Dandelion Sprout's Serbo-Croatian List, EasyList China, EasyList Czech and Slovak, EasyList Dutch, EasyList Germany, EasyList Hebrew, EasyList Italy, EasyList Lithuania, EasyList Polish, EasyList Portuguese, EasyList Spanish, EasyList Thailand, Estonian List, Frellwit's Swedish Filter, Greek AdBlock Filter, Hungarian filter, Icelandic ABP List, IndianList, KAD - Anti-Scam, Latvian List, List-KR, Liste AR, Liste FR, Macedonian adBlock Filters, Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard, Persian Blocker, Polish Annoyances Filters, Polish Anti Adblock Filters, Polish Anti-Annoying Special Supplement, Polish GDPR-Cookies Filters, Polish Social Filters, road-block light, ROList, ROLIST2, RU AdList - Counters, Xfiles, xinggsf, YousList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Block third-party Authorization header, Block WebRTC, Block Push API, Block Location API, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Protect from DPI

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. It still shows infinite loading for "checking site connection security" after the site repeated loading when adguard is on but when I disable it, the site connection settings loads and check itself and redirects me to the site. Re-enabling protection brings back the connection check issue.

2. infinite loading for "checking site connection security"-
![Screenshot_2023-10-26-09-16-49-133_com android chrome-edit](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/107706560/e0862097-545b-499c-9044-279250b3f871)

Same issue on https://apkmody.com-
![Screenshot_2023-10-26-09-24-28-317_com android chrome-edit](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/107706560/2c2ac759-626d-45e7-b429-d0051761d3d8)


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
https://www.amazon.com/Division-Labor-Society-Emile-Durkheim/dp/1420961756

Hi there, the Base Filter is blocking the "Products related to this item" section just below the product descriptions again.  How does this keep happening?  Is Amazon changing something on their end?

Also, I've noticed that it takes significantly longer now for the filters to disable/enable before you can retest pages.  It used to be much quicker.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://coveryourtracks.eff.org/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcoveryourtracks.eff.org%2F) ### Comment > When the MetaMask extension is installed and active in Chrome, the coveryourtracks.eff.org test does not provide values for ‘Blocking tracking ads?’ and ‘Blocking invisible trackers?’. This problem does not occur when the MetaMask extension is disabled. It seems that issue 249, sent in 2015 (https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardForAndroid/issues/249), is not working correctly today. > > To fix the issue, I disabled the following rules in “AdGuard Tracking Protection”: > ||eviltracker.net^$third-party > ||trackersimulator.org^$third-party > ||eviltracker.net^ > ||trackersimulator.org^ > > Then I added the following rules to “User rules” so that it works with my configuration: > ||trackersimulator.org^$stealth=referrer > ||eviltracker.net^$stealth=referrer > > Can you adjust AdGuard’s rules? comment.body:
Здравствуйте. У себя не могу воспроизвести. Пожалуйста, попробуйте отключить-включить блокировщики контента в настройках Safari, перезапустить Safari и проверить обновление фильтров.
Не закрывайте окно AdGuard 30-60 секунд.
Так же попробуйте сторонние фильтры, оставив только необходимые. В safari есть ограничение по количеству используемых правил.

issue.title: coveryourtracks.eff.org
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://coveryourtracks.eff.org/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcoveryourtracks.eff.org%2F) ### Comment > When the MetaMask extension is installed and active in Chrome, the coveryourtracks.eff.org test does not provide values for ‘Blocking tracking ads?’ and ‘Blocking invisible trackers?’. This problem does not occur when the MetaMask extension is disabled. It seems that issue 249, sent in 2015 (https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardForAndroid/issues/249), is not working correctly today. > > To fix the issue, I disabled the following rules in “AdGuard Tracking Protection”: > ||eviltracker.net^$third-party > ||trackersimulator.org^$third-party > ||eviltracker.net^ > ||trackersimulator.org^ > > Then I added the following rules to “User rules” so that it works with my configuration: > ||trackersimulator.org^$stealth=referrer > ||eviltracker.net^$stealth=referrer > > Can you adjust AdGuard’s rules? Thank you. Username: `@WakoKnight` ### Screenshots

issue.title: coveryourtracks.eff.org
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://coveryourtracks.eff.org/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcoveryourtracks.eff.org%2F) ### Comment > When the MetaMask extension is installed and active in Chrome, the coveryourtracks.eff.org test does not provide values for ‘Blocking tracking ads?’ and ‘Blocking invisible trackers?’. This problem does not occur when the MetaMask extension is disabled. It seems that issue 249, sent in 2015 (https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardForAndroid/issues/249), is not working correctly today. > > To fix the issue, I disabled the following rules in “AdGuard Tracking Protection”: > ||eviltracker.net^$third-party > ||trackersimulator.org^$third-party > ||eviltracker.net^ > ||trackersimulator.org^ > > Then I added the following rules to “User rules” so that it works with my configuration: > ||trackersimulator.org^$stealth=referrer > ||eviltracker.net^$stealth=referrer > > Can you adjust AdGuard’s rules? Thank you. Username: `@WakoKnight` ### Screenshots

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
U mnie ten problem się nie pojawia po aktualizacji filtrów.
Spróbuj proszę ręcznie zaktualizować filtry, a potem sprawdź proszę ponownie.
Jeśli problem nadal będzie występował wyłącz proszę po kolei listy filtrów i sprawdź proszę, która lista powoduje ten problem.

comment.body:
> Hi!
> 
> @gototheskinny [This case](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/164827#issuecomment-1788177408) is the same for me, added a rule, please check back in 2 hours.
> 
> 
> 
> @Andy-kl [This type of popup](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/164827#issue-1966601047), unfortunately I cannot reproduce, but since these ads of the same service - I can suggest to check this rule 
> 
> `||get-trust-vpn.info/api_ip_info.php?`
> 
> in the user rule or with an AdGuard Tracking Protection filter update.
> 
> 


@jellizaveta that rule fixed the issue for me. Thank you!.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Nie wiem, czy dobrze rozumiem pytanie, ale żeby zobaczyć co zostało zablokowane przez AdGuarda można otworzyć dziennik filtrowania.
Żeby to zrobić trzeba kliknąć na ikonkę AdGuarda, a potem na `Otwórz dziennik filtrowania`.
<details><summary>Obrazek</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/29142494/5da0258e-3178-42cc-a9f7-63e35dfe37fd)

</details>

Przy czym, jeśli problem pojawia się po wyłączeniu wszystkich filtrów i innych opcji, to nic nie powinno być blokowane.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.15 (4385)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome, Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.tripcentral.ca/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, Adblock Warning Removal List

### Security

_No response_

### Other

Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard French filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Block Location API, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Mask your IP address (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Protect from DPI

### Add your comment and screenshots

The site won’t load when “Protect from DPI” in Stealth Mode is enabled. The error message is:

> This site can’t be reached
> www.tripcentral.ca unexpectedly closed the connection.
> ERR_CONNECTION_CLOSED
> 

This site loads normally when “Protect from DPI” is disabled.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
